channel.title: Daily Inspirational Phrases
channel.description: This feed displays unique inspirational phrases each day.

item.title: Inspiration 1
item.phrase: Begin with a purpose, end with achievement. What's your purpose today?
item.description: Begin with a purpose, end with achievement. What's your purpose today?

item.title: Inspiration 2
item.phrase: Howdy! Boost your creativity and problem-solving skills with these short tips. Keep a positive outlook and take initiative.
item.description: Howdy! Boost your creativity and problem-solving skills with these short tips. Keep a positive outlook and take initiative.

item.title: Inspiration 3
item.phrase: • Sleep on it and revisit with a fresh mind. Rest can bring clarity to complex problems. Give your brain a break and come back refreshed.
item.description: • Sleep on it and revisit with a fresh mind. Rest can bring clarity to complex problems. Give your brain a break and come back refreshed.

item.title: Inspiration 4
item.phrase: • Use analogies to find creative solutions. Comparing your problem to a different context can spark innovative ideas. Look for similarities in other fields.

item.title: Inspiration 5
item.phrase: — "Dream big and dare to fail." — Norman Vaughan
